title: Suspicious Login from New Location
description: User login detected from an unusual geographic location

title: Phishing Email Detected
description: Email containing credential harvesting link detected

title: Multiple Failed Login Attempts
description: Multiple failed login attempts detected from a single IP

description: Trojan malware detected and quarantined on endpoint

title: Suspicious PowerShell Execution
description: Encoded PowerShell command executed by user

title: Privilege Escalation Attempt
description: Unauthorized attempt to add user to admin group

title: Possible Lateral Movement Detected
description: Abnormal SMB traffic between internal hosts

title: Suspicious File Download
description: Executable downloaded from newly registered domain

title: Brute Force Attack Detected
description: Repeated authentication attempts against SSH service

title: Suspicious OAuth Application Consent
description: User granted permissions to unknown OAuth app
